Subject: Jeffrey Epstein 
Date: Wed, 02 Apr 2008 19:58:54 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Dear Jay and Ken: 
I communicated your message to Messrs. Acosta and The U.S. Attorney reiterated that he would like 
me to handle all communications and inquiries related to the Epstein matter so he does not intend to return your 
call unless I advise him that neither I nor my Chief in West Palm Beach, is able to answer your 
question. 
If you would like to arrange a conference call with and myself, please let me know. 
Sincerely, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Fax 561 820-8777 
EFTA00013727
